definition: as soon as possible/at the first opportunity/the sooner the better/before it's too late
to avail oneself of/to take advantage of
early/morning/Good morning!/long ago/prematurely
erhua variant of 趁早[chen4 zao3]

sentences.english: If the conclusions can not be applied in practice, better dump them when it is still early.
sentences.chinese: 如果得出結論不能在實踐中應用，趁早扔了。

sentences.english: Gather ye rose-buds while you may.
sentences.chinese: 採摘含苞的玫瑰要得趁早。

sentences.english: It was not a serious disease anyway if you took it in time, they said.
sentences.chinese: 人家說，倘若趁早醫治，這病是並不太嚴重的。

sentences.english: To read without early and later ACTS regrets ao.
sentences.chinese: 讀書不趁早，後來徒悔懊。

sentences.english: I have realized my depression very early and wanted to nip it in the bud.
sentences.chinese: 其實，很早就發現了，我悶悶不樂，想趁早擺脫憂鬱。

sentences.english: I agree without any reservation that climate change has to be tackled sooner that later.
sentences.chinese: 我毫無保留完全同意應對氣候變化當趁早不趕晚。

sentences.english: My uncle is a son of the morning.
sentences.chinese: 我叔叔是一個趁早趕路的人。

sentences.english: Life is short. Have an affair.
Whoever fights for him shall be put to death by morning!
sentences.chinese: 誰爲他爭論，趁早將誰治死。

definition: breakfast
as early as possible
better to just get the pain over with, rather than prolong the agony
pinyin: chang2 tong4 bu4 ru2 duan3 tong4

definition: lit. quick sword cuts through tangled hemp (idiom); decisive action in a complex situation/cutting the Gordian knot
may I offer a bit of advice
to make a decision when it's time to decide
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
to end one's suffering by dying quickly and being reincarnated/(fig.) to get it over with
if not, then/otherwise
not so/no/or else/otherwise/if not/How about ...?
sooner or later
to advise/to urge/to try to persuade/to exhort/to console/to soothe
(coll.) Don't waste your breath./Save it!
a bit earlier
to determine/to resolve
intolerable/unacceptable
